name: Spike
description: When the spikes are out, they will hurt you for #AMOUNT# damage!

name: Stairs
description: This is the exit! You should go up to the next floor when you are ready!

name: Minor Potion
description: Don't waste this! You should only drink it when you are hurt! It could heal you for #AMOUNT# HP!

name: Minor Poison
description: You should not drink this! It will hurt you every turn until you are at 1 HP!

name: Chest
description: I wonder what's inside! It could be a trap or a treasure! You should open it to find out!

name: Fireball Scroll
description: This will burn all your enemies for #AMOUNT# damage!
